description:
Some time after graduating, Shinpachi decides to organize a reunion with the former students of class 3-Z.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Dousoukai no Mukashibanashi to Anime no Zenwa Kaisou wa Kekkyoku Honpen ga Tarinai Toki no Umeawase
Old Times Talk in Reunions and Last Episode Recaps in Anime Are Just Fillers for When You Have Nothing to Show or Talk About
同窓会の昔話とアニメの前話回想は結局本編が足りない時の埋め合わせ
